client.map

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.base.Controller
      • client.map.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IObserver, IMapController

    public class MapController
extends Controller
implements IMapController, IObserver
    Implementation for the map controller. Holds the Rob view. Also has a pointer to the facade of the model.

        Specified by:
        placeRobber in interface IMapController

        Post-Conditions

      • startMove

        public void startMove(PieceType pieceType,
             boolean isFree,
             boolean allowDisconnected)
        The Player is placing a piece
        Specified by:
        startMove in interface IMapController
        Parameters:
        pieceType - The type of piece to be placed
        isFree - true if the piece should not cost the player resources, false otherwise. Set to true during initial setup and when a road building card is played.
        allowDisconnected - true if the piece can be disconnected, false otherwise. Set to true only during initial setup.
        Pre-Conditions
        the player has decided to play a piece
        Post-Conditions
        the map shows options of placement for that piece.

      • cancelMove

        public void cancelMove()
        The Player is no longer placing a piece
        Specified by:
        cancelMove in interface IMapController
        Pre-Conditions
        the player was placing a piece
        Post-Conditions
        the map no longer shows options of placement for that piece.
